name: Crystal Curse
description:
You have been dammed! Defend the crystal to use it's power to lift the curse and break out of the loop!

Remember the waves when going back through the loop to prepare yourself better for next time!

Graphics by Dr Smey
Programming Louie Jams

Controls:
Arrows keys to move
Space to jump
"Z" to pick up and place traps

"Q" to quit
"R" to restart
"C" to go to controls page

Soundtrack used from Anttis instrumentals
